extendedInfo.description: Mystery Hidden Objects For KidsHidden Object is the perfect casual game for you if you are looking for a fun, easy to learn but - at the same time - challenging casual game. It is a traditional hidden object game. The goal of the game is to find the hidden objects before you run out of time. You see on the right side of the screen which objects you have to find. If you find a hidden object you simply have to click on it. Will you find all the hidden objects?Hidden Object is a free game in which your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before!Hidden Object has beatiful and cute cartoon graphics and nice effects.The app is include 6 different exotic and smart stages . these are;picnicmake-upcar washyogaironingcookingThe application heroes are as beautiful as Barbie , brave enough like winx girls,and so adorable like princess  cotton-spirited ...LIKE us on Facebook;https://www.facebook.com/pages/Fornox-Software/493166937398426This application is safe to use, and FREE!Please feel free to rate and share our games with your friends!https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Fornox+Software

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I really lke the game need more games like this
reviews.author: Tangelia Hall

reviews.title: AD TOO GRAPHIC FOR KIDS
reviews.comment: Would have given a 5 star due to my grandson enjoying the game...but when I noticed the pop ad for \"Local Rehab\".... I surly didn\'t want to figure out how to explain that to my 4 yr old grandson. Those types of ads should be for adult type games, NOT on childrens games!!!!!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Lambright

reviews.title: Ads in way of the game
reviews.comment: Daughter loved it till the times up page came up and then cant get off that page due to the back button being under the ad.
reviews.author: David Lara

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Fun game for my 6yr old daughter she loves it
reviews.author: Michelle Brooks
